altTitles.ja: ふしぎねこのきゅーちゃん

description.en:
There’s more to this kitty than meets the eye! Kyuu-chan loves snacks, cuddles, and bow ties, but most of all loves Hinata, the young professional who adopted this mischievous wonder cat into his home.

As the two adjust to life together, they discover that they have a lot to learn from each other.

The ordinary and the extraordinary live side by side in this delightful slice-of-life manga!

---

- **[Official English license announcement](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/2020/08/28/seven-seas-isnt-kitten-around-with-license-of-wondercat-kyuu-chan-manga-series/)**

- **[ManiManiTV YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/ManiManiTV/videos/), Official Kyuu-chan motion comic videos:** [#1,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zCBZUbEbI-w) [#2,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wSJURvGO494) [#3](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ytJbXHsqikw)…
description.ro: O manga adorabilă color despre un tânăr ce salvează o pisică foarte specială. Dar pisica asta nu e ceea ce pare! Kyuu-chan iubeste mâncarea, îmbrățișările și fundele, dar cel mai mult, îl iubește pe Hinata, tânărul care l-a adoptat. Pe măsură ce se obișnuiesc să trăiască împreună, ei descoperă că au mult de învățat unul de la celălalt. Vedeți viața ordinară și extraordinară pe care cei doi o trăiesc în această minunată slice-of-life manga pentru toți iubitorii de animale și nu numai!
description.ru: Милая история о повседневной жизни бездомного котика Кю и человека, который решает его приютить.
description.pt-br: Hinata é um jovem trabalhador que leva uma vida mundana. No meio de uma tempestade de neve, ele acha um gato abandonado passando frio em uma caixa de papelão, e decide o levar pra casa. O que Hinata não sabia é que ele tinha acabado de pegar o melhor gato de todos!

title.en: My Fake Girlfriend's Defending Against Their Attacks

altTitles.zh: 我的假女友正全力防御她们的进攻

altTitles.en: My Fake Girlfriend's Defending Against Their Attack
My Fake Girlfriends are using me as a Shield

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo De Jia Nüyou Zheng Quanli Fangyu Tamen De Jingong

description.en: One day, I was suddenly confessed to by a girl, and in order to reject her, I had to find a fake girlfriend! I didn’t expect that my plan to avoid trouble… would lead to even bigger trouble?! The tsundere "Vicious Princess" from the Archery Club, the "White Fox" who is adept at teasing, the "Flower of the Highlands" with straight black hair, and…a sister with a severe case of brocon! Could my youth romantic comedy be wrong as well too?!

When school is over, Tsubasa, an elementary schooler, works at her grandfather's bookstore. The books they provide are of a slightly lewd kind, which is just a little bit of trouble for an elementary schooler.
Kurenai Shinkurou, a 16-year-old dispute mediator, is one day approached by the daughter of a powerful plutocratic family asking him to be her bodyguard.
description.ru:
Синкуро Курэнай – сирота, он учится в старшей школе, изучает боевые искусства и не брезгует разнообразными подработками, в том числе опасными: отваживает рэкетиров, ловит хулиганов и пр. И вот его работодатель, экстравагантная и рисковая Бэника-сама, предлагает Синкуро новое дело – защиту маленькой Мурасаки Кухоин, дочери авторитетного якудзы. Казалось бы, для Синкуро это работа «по профилю», однако, помимо безопасности барышни Мурасаки, на юного телохранителя ложатся совершенно непривычные для него обязанности по уходу-кормлению-купанию-вразумлению своенравной шестилетки…   
Adapted from the light novel series of the same name.

description.en: Zig—a tall, broad-shouldered mercenary—participates in a witch hunt. Following a fierce duel with the deadly witch, he becomes privy to her desire. “I want you to protect me,” she requests, tired of having her life trivialized. Seeking a place to survive, the witch and the mercenary set their sights on an unknown continent!
Kon lives in a world that bugs out regularly. But with Kasane, a researcher who studies these phenomena, he knows that each day will at least be interesting!

Tomo Aizawa was able to successfully confess to her crush Junichirou Kubota. There is only one problem: He just sees her as his buddy. He thought that she was a boy until they went to middle school together, because her grade school was in a different school district.
A man stumbles upon a particularly arrogant slave...

altTitles.en: My First Girlfriend is a Gal

altTitles.pt-br: Minha primeira namorada é uma Gal!

description.en: Spring. The 'season of love' has arrived and it seems that finding himself a girlfriend was harder than Jun'ichi believed. To break the status quo, Jun'ichi's friends have forced him into confessing to the gyaru, Yame Yukana. However, things do not go quite as he expected. A series of "firsts" begins!
description.pt-br: Junichi Hashiba é um jovem colegial virgem que está desesperado para perder esse status. Sob pressão de seus amigos, o garoto acaba se declarando para Yukana Yame. Surpreendentemente a garota aceita  e um casal é formado. Porém, Jun acaba se encontrando em águas desconhecidas com Yame, que é uma gyaru (um tipo de moda urbana japonesa). Enquanto ele fantasia em perder a sua virgindade, ela se mostra mais normal e inocente do que ele imaginava.

title.en: Kara no Kyoukai - The Garden of Sinners

altTitles.ja-ro: Kara no Kyōkai the Garden of sinners
Kara no Kyoukai the Garden of Sinners
Kara no Kyoukai: The Garden of Sinners

altTitles.ja: 空の境界 the Garden of sinners

altTitles.zh: 空之境界the Garden of sinners

description.en:
A very popular early work from Kinoko Nasu from the Tsukihime & Fate fame, the Kara no Kyoukai universe has meet great success as an animated film adaptation, novels and radio dramas.  
  
Kara no Kyoukai depicts a world where the true dark nature of the human being is being reviewed and exposed by shocking and ruthless events, and in the center of it all we have Ryougi Shiki, the true heir to the long lived, wealthy and mysterious Ryougi clan and Kokuto Mikiya, a would be normal high school student if it wouldn't be for his amazing deductive & investigative progress.  
  
The moment Kokuto and Shiki meet is the moment that the wheel of fate started to turn, however is this fate moving forward naturally on it's own accord, or is it all being orchestrated from behind the scenes by an enigmatic persona? Only time will tell.

Shiiba Gaku wants to be the boss of Kushima High, which is popularly known as “Windmill”. In order to become number one, he has to face many challenges because the school is full of tough opponents. Just as he decides to take the fist step, an afro-looking guy interrupts him. What will happen from now on? Will he be able to realize his dream?

The weakest demon (slime) who longed to be human is reincarnated as a saint, but with the worst character of all, a villainous noble girl. From the lowest status, hated and resented; an existence where she will be terminated immediately if her true identity as a slime is discovered, she will become a beloved saint in order to live a safe and secure life!

A fabled genius at killing resides somewhere hidden in Tokyo. Taught since childhood to obey the orders of his boss, he is ordered to live in Osaka as a normal person for one year in order for the boss to lay low.    ---- **Won the 41st Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2017**
___
[Alt Official English (US ONLY)](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10055/episode/323851)

title.en: After School Labyrinth Adventurer ~ I'm now able to go back and forth between Japan and another world, and I'll work hard to level up~

altTitles.ja-ro: Houkago no Meikyuu Boukensha: Nippon to Isekai wo Ikiki Dekiru You ni Natta Boku wa Level Up ni Isoshimi Masu

altTitles.ja: 放課後の迷宮冒険者～日本と異世界を行き来できるようになった僕はレベルアップに勤しみます～

description.en:
Akira Kudo, a high school student who can freely travel back and forth between Japan and another world, Do Merta. With no goals in mind, he spends his time after school enjoying life in another world as he is!

As an adventurer, he gets teased by the guild's receptionist, receives "rewards" from his magic master, and has fun with the girl he helped...!?

"I hate pain! I don't care about ranking up! Guild requests are also troublesome!"

A leisurely labyrinth exploration fantasy just for after school!

Yuusuke, a 7th grader, is interested in his friend's older sister for various reasons.
The older sister, while a little strange, is a kind and caring girl.
She's mysterious but is popular with everyone.  
This is an ordinary comedy about Mayuri-san's mysterious everyday life.

title.en: With Vengeance, Sincerely, Your Broken Saintess

altTitles.ja: 傷だらけ聖女より報復をこめて

altTitles.en: Vengeance from a Saint Full of Wounds
The Holy Wound Became a Villain

altTitles.es: La santa herida se convirtió en villana

altTitles.ja-ro: Kizu Darake Seijo Yori Houfuku wo Komete

description.ar: لوا ، قديس مرشح مع قوى الشفاء. ومع ذلك ، فقد كانت قدراتها معيبة ، وستتألم وتتألم لنفسها من أجل نقل الأعراض لنفسها والشفاء منها. عاملها المرشحون القديسون على أنها عيب ، لكن صديقتها المقربة أريان كانت دائمًا هناك. في يوم من الأيام ، يحتضر جاروت ، قائد الفرسان الذي تهتم به روا. بعد أن تلتئم جراحه تمامًا ، تتجول لوا بين الحياة والموت في حدود قدراتها. ومع ذلك ، عندما استيقظ ، كان كل الفضل يعود إلى أريان ، وتم تحديد خطوبة جاروت وأريان. بالنظر إلى طبيعة أريان الحقيقية ، تعرض للضرب المبرح من قبل جاروت. في حالة من اليأس ، تعهد لوا بعدم شفاء أي شخص بعد الآن. ثم يسأل الأمير الثاني سوين ، “لماذا لا تنتقم من أولئك الذين أهانوك
description.en: Lua, a candidate saint with healing powers. However, her abilities were flawed, and she would be pained and painful to herself in order to transfer the symptoms to herself and heal them. The saintly candidates treated her as a flaw, but only her best friend Ariane was always there. One day, Garrot, the Knight Commander whom Lua cares about, is dying. After completely healing his wounds, Lua wanders between life and death at the limit of her abilities. However, when he awoke, all the credit belonged to Ariane, and Garrot and Arian's engagement had been decided. Seeing Arian's true nature, he is coldly beaten by Garrot. In despair, Lua vowed not to heal anyone anymore. Then the Second Prince Swen asks, "Why don't you take revenge on those who have demeaned you?" She uses another ability she has been hiding – the atrocious ability to inflict healing symptoms on others – and joins forces with Swen to start a new life as an "evil woman" instead of a "saint."

altTitles.ja: ビューティフル プレース

description.en: Follows two girls born in Japan during a civil war. Shimon Hanazawa is a woman who participates in her school's "volunteer activities," and Momoko Takasaka is her classmate and instructor.

Is it safe to fall in love with you?
After losing her family to the revolt, noblewoman Lysithea hires Taron, a strapping young broker, to help her flee the kingdom. But when a heavy snowstorm strands the bickering pair in an eerie abandoned mansion, Lysithea has no choice but to rely on her new partner. What dangerous romance awaits them?
description.pl:
Można się w tobie bezpiecznie zakochać?
Po stracie rodziny w wyniku rewolty, szlachcianka Lysithea zatrudnia Tarona, młodego maklera, aby pomógł jej uciec z królestwa. Ale kiedy ciężka burza śnieżna zatrzymuje kłótliwą parę w niesamowitej opuszczonej rezydencji, Lysithea nie ma wyboru i musi polegać na swoim nowym partnerze. Jaki niebezpieczny romans ich czeka?

altTitles.zh-ro: Xing Meng Ou Xiang Ji Hua

description.en: The shining lights, the magnificent stage! Friendships created through singing, making a future through dancing, the girls embark on their journey towards their dreams! One who has lost status due to a scandal is hiding a plot behind her back. A pair of bosom friends, separated by fate. A girl who tries to exonerate her mother sets off on her journey for a talent competition. When the stage turns into an empty battlefield, she uses her voice to chase after her dreams.

altTitles.en: I'm an Evil Woman, so Can I Die Now?
I'm a Villainess, Can I Die?

altTitles.pt-br: Eu sou uma vilã, então posso morrer agora?

altTitles.es: La villana quiere morir otra vez
Incluso si renací, quiero morir de nuevo

altTitles.ja-ro: Akujo wa Mata Shi wo Erabu

altTitles.zh: 我是反派，死了也没关系吗?

altTitles.th: ลิขิตชีวิตนางร้าย

description.en:
“I was reborn… and I want to die again.”

Despite choosing to die in her previous life, our protagonist is reborn as Selena, the short-lived villainess from a novel. The character Selena was written to be so villainous she spends her final moments isolated in a dungeon. But our reincarnated protagonist has no will to live anyway, so she might as well jump (again) and save Selena from her predetermined miserable fate. But when Selena’s family and a knight prevent her from dying, what can she do…?

---
My sick sibling has passed away, so I don't want to live anymore. With that, I chose to end my life, but how did I become a villainess in a novel?! Facing with such a miserable end, I thought I could end this troubled life with my own hands… But why are they still trying to save me?

"Don't deprive me of your partner status, Selina."

"Can you dare to be greedy?"

My life is getting better and better, but the death day is also getting nearer. What do I have to do?

---

description.es:
Mi hermana enferma murió por lo que mi utilidad ha terminado. Con eso elijo morir, pero ¡¿me convertí en una villana en una novela de tercera categoría?! Ante el miserable final, pensé que podía acabar con esta problemática, llevándome mi vida con mis propias manos… Pero, ¿ ¿Por qué siguen intentando salvarme?

"No me quites tu estatus de pareja, Serena."

"¿Pue des atreverte a ser codicioso?"

Mi vida es cada vez mejor y el día en que moriré se acerca. ¿Qué tengo que hacer?

---

altTitles.en: I'm Worried About My Girlfriend, Who Used to be Covered in Bruises (Fan Colored)

altTitles.ja: 元 痣だらけの彼女が心配で (Fan Colored)

altTitles.pl: Martwię Się o Moją Dziewczynę, Która Była Kiedyś Pokryta w Bliznach (Fan Colored)

altTitles.ru: Я беспокоюсь о своей девушке, которая раньше была вся в синяках (Fan Colored)

altTitles.tr: Eskiden Bandajlarla Kaplanmış Olan Sevgilim Hakkında Endileşeniyorum (Fan Colored)

description.en: Continuation of [Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de](https://mangadex.org/title/ed18c276-08f0-4378-99fa-41b622bb7203/azadarake-no-classmate-ga-shinpai-de).

title.en: Maydare Tensei Monogatari: Kono Sekai de Ichiban Warui Majo

altTitles.ja: メイデーア転生物語 この世界で一番悪い魔女

altTitles.en: Tales of Reincarnation in Maydare: The World's Worst Witch

altTitles.de: Wiedergeburt in Maydare: Die bösartigste Hexe der Welt

altTitles.fr: Les contes de la réincarnation en le Maydaré
Les contes de la réincarnation en le Maydaré: La pire sorcière en le monde

description.de: Einst rettete Makia, die Tochter einer berüchtigten Hexe, dem Sklavenjungen Thor das Leben. Gemeinsam wuchsen sie auf und erlernten magische Fähigkeiten. Doch dann reißt das Schicksal sie auseinander und Makia landet an einer Magierakademie, wo sie sich schwört, die beste Schülerin ihres Jahrgangs zu werden, um ihren alten Freund möglichst schnell wiederzufinden. Denn es gibt noch ein weiteres Geheimnis, das sie verbindet: Beide kamen ursprünglich aus einer anderen Welt nach Maydare! Dort war Makia eine gewöhnliche, japanische Oberschülerin, die gemeinsam mit zwei anderen Klassenkameraden umgebracht wurde. Wird es ihr gelingen, das Verbrechen aufzuklären und in der neuen Welt ihr Glück zu finden?
description.en:
Makia is a noble lady descended from an infamous witch. Thor, a boy who was raised with her and came from another world, is chosen to be the knight of the "savior." The two are forced apart, and to see Thor once again, Makia aims to be the top student at Magic School!  


---
description.fr: Makia est une noble dame issue d'une infâme sorcière. Thor, un garçon qui a été élevé avec elle et est venu d'un autre monde, est choisi pour être le chevalier du «sauveur». Les deux sont forcés de se séparer, et pour revoir Thor, Makia vise à être la meilleure élève de Magic School!
description.id: Makia adalah seorang gadis bangsawan yang merupakan keturunan dari seorang penyihir yang dikenal akan kejahatannya. Thor, seorang anak laki-laki yang dirawat bersama makia dan datang dari dunia lain, dipilih untuk menjadi seorang ksatria bagi sang "penyelamat". Keduanya terpaksa harus berpisah karena suatu alasan, dan ketika mereka berdua dipertemukan kembali, Makia bertekad untuk menjadi murid terbaik yang ada di sekolah sihir! ---
description.ru: Загадочный мир под названием «Мейдер». В нём существуют магия, рыцари, драконы и… ведьмы. Макия – юная волшебница из дворянской семьи, являющаяся потомком «Самой худшей ведьмы этого мира», и любительница провести вечерок-другой, изучая новые заклинания. Однажды она встречает необычного паренька, которому даёт имя Тор. Вместе они продолжают углубляться в исследование колдовства и довольно быстро находят общий язык. Это начало длинной истории о девочке, пытающейся понять себя и свои истинные чувства.
description.tr: Makia, kötü şöhretli bir cadının soyundan gelen asil bir hanımefendi. Başka bir dünyadan gelen ve Makia ile birlikte büyüyen Thor, "Kurtarıcı"nın şövalyesi olarak seçiliyor. İkisi de birbirlerinden ayrılmak zorunda kalıyorlar ve Makia, Thor'u bir kez daha görmek için Büyü Okulu'nun en iyi öğrencisi olmayı hedefliyor!

title.en: Door no Mukou ni wa Romance

altTitles.en: Romance is Just Behind the Door

altTitles.ja: ドアの向こうにはロマンス

description.en: When Kagami calls an escort service to a hotel one night, the guy who shows up at his door turns out to be precisely his type. But his elation at this stroke of luck soon vanishes as he realizes that Minato is, in fact, a food delivery boy who has come to his room by mistake. Unable to pass up this one-time chance, Kagami plants a kiss on Minato as a joke... But when Minato serendipitously shows up to deliver food to his house the next day, Kagami finds himself drawn more and more to this sweet and straightforward boy…

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女にあこがれて

description.en:
Hiiragi Utena, a girl who loves Magical Girls, lives her ordinary everyday life wishing to be like them. One day a curious character appears in front of her and offers her the power to make her wishes come true, but…  
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, the fierce battle begins!  

---
**Links:**

- [Alternative Official Release by Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/1110)
description.fr:
**Je fais des choses tellement horribles à mes Magical Girls préférées !**

Moi, c’est Utena Hiiragi, et comme toutes les filles de mon âge, j’adore les magical girls !
Un jour, une étrange créature aux allures de mascotte m’a lancé un sort, et je suis devenue capable de me transformer, moi aussi !
Je vais pouvoir me battre aux côtés de mes héroïnes préférées !
Enfin, c’est ce que je croyais…

C’est quoi, cette tenue scandaleuse ?
Et comment ça, je suis au service du Mal ?!

Mais qu’est-ce que c’est que cette histoire ?!

**La comédie BDSM dans laquelle s’affrontent des Magical Girls !!**

**Avec ses personnages tous plus fous les uns que les autres, Looking Up to Magical Girls balaye les genres et nous place du côté du mal ! Akihiro Ononaka déploie tout l’arsenal BDSM à sa disposition pour nous proposer un concentré d’humour légèrement sexy et complètement déjanté !**

---
**Links:**
- [Official French](https://www.amazon.fr/Looking-up-Magical-Girls-1/dp/2382750731/)
description.uk: Хііраґі Утена завжди захоплювалася чарівними дівчатами і мріяла перетворитися на круту героїню, яка бореться зі злом. Тож, коли одного вечора до неї підходить талісман, яка стверджує, що в ній дрімає магічна сила, вона тремтить від хвилювання. Але її барвиста мрія швидко розбивається об іронічний поворот подій, коли вона перетворюється на лиходійку!
description.es-la:
Hiiragi Utena, una chica que ama a las Chicas Mágicas, vive su vida cotidiana y desea ser como ellas.
Un día aparece un personaje curioso frente a ella y le ofrece el poder de hacer realidad sus deseos, pero...
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, ¡comienza la feroz batalla!
description.pt-br: Hiiragi Utena é uma garota apaixonada por Mahou Shoujo que sonhava em se tornar uma delas e poder lutar ao lado de sua heroína favorita. Certo dia, um mascote inesperadamente apareceu ao seu lado e lançou uma feitiço em Hiiragi, oferecendo a ela a oportunidade de estar de frente para sua ídolo. Entretanto, diferente do que ela esperava, a transformação a fez virar uma vilã ao invés de uma mahou shoujo. Para piorar, a mudança faz com que ela deixe de ser uma tímida garota e passe a ser uma dominatrix sádica. Agora Hiiragi precisará lidar com sua nova “profissão”, ao mesmo tempo que tenta aproveitar os momentos ao lado de sua heroína, por mais que seja para tentar torturá-la.

title.en: Yarinaoshi Reijou wa Ryuutei Heika wo Kouryaku-chuu

altTitles.ja: やり直し令嬢は竜帝陛下を攻略中

The Returnee Noble Lady in the Middle of Conquesting His Majesty the Dragon Emperor

小姐重生征服龍帝陛下 (Nom Script)

altTitles.id: Seorang Putri Yang Kembali Ke Masa Lalu Sedang Menaklukkan Kaisar Naga

description.en:
The curtains rise on the tale of a young lady who once stormed the battlefields now getting to start her life all over again!  
  
The young noblewoman, Jill, was sentenced to death by her fiancé, the Crown Prince. Just as she was on the brink of death, time rewinds back to when she was 10 years old, to the party where her engagement had been decided!   
  
Determined to avoid going down the same path to ruin, Jill hastily proposes to the person behind her, only to discover that he’s none other than Hades, the Emperor of the neighboring kingdom who’s (set to) fall into darkness, ergo the worst villain.
description.id:
Jill Savelle- seorang tunangan dari pangeran putra mahkota Gerald de Kleitos yang memiliki gelar "Dewi Perang"- telah diburu oleh negaranya sendiri yang telah dilindunginya. Dikhianati oleh pasangannya sendiri, dia difitnah sebagai sorang penghianat kemudian dijebloskan kedalam penjara. Di waktu-waktu terakhirnya, Jill memiliki banyak penyesalan, tapi ketika ajal sedang menjemputnya, dia tiba-tiba saja terbangun pada saat 6 tahun lalu. Dan kali ini, dia telah bertekad untuk tidak diperalat lagi.

Sekarang, sebagai seorang gadis berusia 10 tahun, Jill memutuskan untuk melarikan diri dari pertunangan dengan pangeran yang menghampirinya. Dan pada akhirnya, dia secara tidak sengaja melamar pria berumur 19 tahun yang dikenal sebagai kaisar naga hades theos rave, yang nantinya akan menghancurkan negaranya. Tapi tanpa disangka, dia malah menerima lamarannya!

Berbanding terbalik dengan ingatan Jill yang dulu, sekarang Jill melihat kalau Hades yang saat ini merupakan seorang kaisar yang sedang tidak beruntung.  Jadi bisakah Jill mencegah sang kaisar terjatuh kedalam jurang kegelapan? ataukah malah nasibnya sudah tidak bisa diubah lagi?

title.en: Astral Online - Maou no Noroi de Saikyou Bishoujo ni natta Ore, Saijaku Shoku da ga Cheat Skill de Chou Seichou shite Musou suru

altTitles.ja: アストラル・オンライン 魔王の呪いで最強美少女になったオレ、最弱職だがチートスキルで超成長して無双する

altTitles.en: Astral Online: I, Who Became the Strongest Beautiful Girl Due to the Demon King's Curse, Have the Weakest Job but I Grow Up Super Fast With My Cheat Skills and Become a Warrior.

description.en:
A high school boy, Sora Kamijo, who is addicted to VR games, starts playing Astral Online, a VRMMO that has been talked about as a god game, and suddenly finds himself fighting against the Demon King, the last boss. In addition to the sudden battle, the Demon King casts a curse on him and transforms him into a beautiful silver-haired girl...?　

A new VRMMO fantasy involving both the game and reality begins!

altTitles.en: A Gypsy's Trick to the Duke

altTitles.th: รักวุ่นวายของนายหญิงกำมะลอ

description.de:
Silvia Lauren ist die Herzogin von Aswan und die Frau des blutrünstigen Kriegsfanatikers und Herzogs Victor Aswan. Sie ist außerdem seit Kurzem schwanger mit Victors erstem Kind. Zumindest ist das die Fassade, die sie erschaffen hat, um sich ihren Platz im Anwesen des Herzogs zu erschleichen, während dieser auf einem weit entfernten Schlachtfeld um Ruhm und Ehre kämpft. Aber als Victor viel früher als erwartet aus dem Krieg zurückkehrt, gerät Silvias Vorhaben ins Wanken. Anstatt sie allerdings in hohem Bogen aus dem Haus zu werfen, entscheidet sich Victor dazu, bei ihrem Plan mitzuspielen und erwartet voller Freude – oder besser: Schadenfreude – die Geburt seines nicht existenten Kindes. Wie lange wird Silvia es schaffen, ihre Lügen aufrechtzuerhalten und an der Seite des Herzogs zu bleiben?

description.en:
Silvia Lauren is the duchess of the Aswan estate and the wife of the bloodthirsty war addict, Duke Victor Aswan. She is also one-month pregnant with Victor's first child. At least, that's the façade she has created in order to secretly reside in the duke's castle while he is away fighting in a war. But when Victor returns from battle much earlier than anticipated, Silvia fears that her intricate lies will all come to light. However, instead of throwing her out of his home right away, Victor decides to go along with her scheme and happily awaits the birth of his nonexistent child—and by happily, it's more like threateningly. How long will Silvia be able to keep up with her lies and remain by the ruthless duke's side?

---

description.fr:
Silvia Lauren est la duchesse d'Aswan et l'épouse du duc Victor Aswan, un fanatique de guerre assoiffé de sang. Elle est également enceinte d'un mois du premier enfant de Victor. En tout cas, telle est l'histoire qu'elle a créée de toutes pièces afin de résider en secret dans la demeure du duc alors que celui-ci est parti au front. Mais lorsque Victor revient du champ de bataille beaucoup plus tôt que prévu, Silvia craint que son mensonge n'éclate au grand jour. Toutefois, plutôt que de la renvoyer de sa demeure sur-le-champ, Victor décide de jouer le jeu et déclare d'un ton joyeux (ou plutôt extrêmement menaçant) attendre avec impatience la naissance de son enfant fictif. Combien de temps Silvia pourra-t-elle continuer à mentir et rester aux côtés de l'impitoyable duc?

description.id:
Duke kami, yang datang tahun lalu, kembali tanpa sekarat. Sylvia, seorang bangsawan miskin, meninggalkan rumahnya untuk menghindari pernikahan yang tidak diinginkan. Tempat Sylvia membuat rumah barunya adalah fanatik Dukes of War, Victor Aswan. Dikabarkan sebagai pembunuh yang kejam, dia ditakdirkan untuk berlama-lama dalam pertempuran selama 20 tahun ke depan. Sudah sebulan sejak Sylvia bahagia di Kastil Duke sambil berpura-pura menjadi pengantin Victor. "Kamu bilang kamu punya anakku?" Duke, yang telah pergi selama tujuh tahun, tiba-tiba kembali.

description.ko:
<사기치다 걸려서 결혼해버렸습니다.>

빚만 남기고 죽어버린 아버지, 계모와 이복 동생의 구박에 견디다 못한 실비아 로렌은 가출 후 전쟁광 아스완 공작성에 숨어든다.
공작 빅터가 출정 나간 탓에 7년 동안 방치 되 온 공작성. 눈치 빠른 실비아는 오는 길에 적군의 습격을 받았다는 거짓말과 함께 아스완 공작의 하나뿐인 아이를 임신한 아내인 척 연기한다.
그렇게 공작 부인으로 살던 어느날, 전쟁터에서 아스완 공작이 죽지 않고 살아 돌아오는데! 실비아를 쫓아내기는 커녕 그녀의 사기행각을 눈감아 주는 빅터. 무시무시한 전쟁광의 공작성에서 과연 실비아 로렌의 운명은?

---

description.en:
In a world where manga can be enjoyed forever…
Manga culture has been able to blossom thanks to the power of manga lovers.
However, right now, manga is suffering because of piracy.
We need your help.

(Source: [Manga Planet](https://mangaplanet.com/blog/stop-piracy/))

---

description.es:
En un mundo donde el manga se puede disfrutar para siempre...
La cultura del manga ha podido florecer gracias al poder de los amantes del manga.
Sin embargo, ahora mismo, el manga está sufriendo a causa de la piratería.
Necesitamos tu ayuda.
description.ja:
いつまでも漫画を楽しめる世の中に 漫画を愛するみなさまの力で
漫画文化は花開きました。
しかし、今、漫画は海賊版に苦しんでいます。
みなさまの力が必要です。
まずは、下の「漫画」を読んでみてください。
漫画の未来を一緒に創りましょう！

description.en:
When Keita frees Whisper, a ghost-like youkai, from 190 years of imprisonment, Whisper pledges to protect Keita from supernatural dangers. Whisper also gives Keita a watch that allows Keita to see other youkai. Together with the twin-tailed cat spirit Jibanyan, they encounter many youkai-related problems and solve them.


---
Official Release:
- English Asia release by Shogakukan Asia - Singapore
- English North America release by Viz Media
- Indonesian release by Elex Media
- Spanish release by Norma Editorial
- Latin-American release by Panini
description.es:
Cuando Nathan libera a Whisper, un yo-kai con aspecto de fantasma, de 190 años de prisión, Whisper se compromete a proteger a Nathan de los peligros sobrenaturales. Whisper también le da a Nathan un reloj que le permite ver a otros yo-kais. Junto con el espíritu gato de dos colas Jibanyan, se enfrentan a muchos problemas relacionados con los yo-kai los resuelven.


---
Lanzamiento oficial:
- Lanzamiento en español de España por Norma Editorial
- Lanzamiento en español de Latinoamérica por Panini

description.en:
Lee Ye-joo, a lone female college student, has a secret. A special ability to leap over time beyond the unknown door! But the uncontrolled ability is just a curse, and what she faced one day after moving for as many as a thousand years was a mad world in which the absolute red-eyed ran wild. An unidentified man who causes earthquakes and lightning by beckoning only refers to her as a "timer" and makes her his target of extermination for that reason.

In a hurry to survive and return to the past, she lies without even knowing what the meaning of "timer" is.

"Take me to the other humans and I'll tell you where to live!"

The contractual relationship tied in exchange for the reserved death, but the man's back was stronger and warmer than expected.

Is that why? She didn't plan it.

I want to melt the frozen future...

"Not only do you live, but you've also created feelings that I don't know."

An omnipotent obsession with a woman who was tied up in the future to avoid death, and a chasing romance that risked her life.

altTitles.th: เจ้าสาวแห่งทางสายไหม

description.ar: تدور أحداث القصة في بلدة ريفية بالقرب من بحر قزوين في آسيا الوسطى خلال أواخر القرن التاسع عشر عند الغزو الروسي ، وتدور القصة حول امرأة شابة ، أمير ، تصل من قرية بعيدة عبر الجبال لتتزوج كارلوك ، شاب ثماني سنوات. صغارها. يتتبع المسلسل علاقتهما أثناء تطورها ، بينما يقدم قصصًا أخرى حول مختلف الشابات وحياتهن اليومية مع خطيبهن وأزواجهن على طول طريق الحرير .
description.de: Die zwanzigjährige Amira wird von ihrem Clan zu einer Familie jenseits der Berge geschickt, damit sie deren zwölfjährigen Sohn Karluk heiratet. Nach der Hochzeit fügt sich Amira schnell in ihre neue Familie ein. Während sie einige Zeit nach ihrer Hochzeit mit Karluk entfernte Verwandte seines Clans besucht, beschließt ihre eigene Familie, sie zurückzufordern, da sie mit Amira andere Pläne haben...
description.en:
Central Asia, mid-19th century: in a rural town near the Caspian Sea, a young woman named Amir arrives from a distant village across the mountains to marry Karluk, a boy eight years her junior. The story unfolds among details of everyday family and community life. However, the peaceful atmosphere is disturbed when Amir's family demands to take her back to their village.

---
- **Won the 7th Manga Taisho Award in 2014**
description.es: Ambientada en una ciudad rural cerca del mar Caspio en Asia Central a finales del siglo xix, la historia gira en torno a una joven llamada Amira, que llega de un pueblo distante a través de las montañas para casarse con Karluk, un joven ocho años menor que ella. La serie sigue su relación a medida que se desarrolla, al tiempo que presenta otras historias sobre varias mujeres jóvenes y su vida cotidiana con sus respectivos novios y esposos a lo largo de la Ruta de la Seda.
description.fi: Tarina seuraa aluksi tuoreen morsiamen, Amiran, sekä hänen uuden perheensä elämää. Myöhemmin muun muassa kuljetaan tutkimusmatkailijan seurassa ja tutustutaan uusiin seutuihin ja uusiin morsiamiin. Upea piirrosjälki, taidokas tunnelmanluonti, uskottavasti rakennettu eksoottinen miljöö sekä useat kiinnostavat henkilöhahmot tekevät Aron morsiamista vuoden mangatapauksen!
description.fr:
La vie d’Amir, 20 ans, est bouleversée le jour où elle est envoyée dans le clan voisin pour y être mariée. Elle y rencontre Karluk, son futur époux… un garçon de huit ans son cadet ! Autre village, autres mœurs… La jeune fille, chasseuse accomplie, découvre une existence différente, entre l’aïeule acariâtre, une ribambelle d’enfants et Smith, l’explorateur anglais venu étudier leurs traditions.

Mais avant même que le jeune couple ait eu le temps de se faire à sa nouvelle vie, le couperet tombe : pour conclure une alliance plus avantageuse avec un puissant voisin, le clan d’Amir décide de récupérer la jeune femme coûte que coûte…
description.id:
Karluk Eyhon dan Amira Hargal adalah pasangan suami istri dengan usia terpaut delapan tahun (Amira 20 tahun dan Karluk 12 tahun). Setelah menikah mereka tinggal bersama dengan Keluarga Karluk.
Hubungan keduanya pun berjalan dengan baik. Namun, ketenangan mereka kemudian terusik oleh kedatangan kakak serta sepupu Amira yang berniat membawanya pulang. Apa yang sebenarnya terjadi!?
description.it: Tardo XIX secolo, nelle vicinanze del Mar Caspio in Asia centrale, lungo la via della seta. La ventenne Amira viene mandata dalle montagne in cui vive ad un altro villaggio, per sposare il più giovane Karluk, appena dodicenne. Dopo gli iniziali imbarazzi per la differenza di età fra i due, il loro rapporto comincia ad essere sempre più unito e Amira inizia ad abituarsi alla vita della tribù e ad integrarsi nella comunità, ma la pace viene disturbata quando delle persone della famiglia di Amira raggiungono il villaggio per riprenderla con loro.
description.ja: 美貌の娘・アミル（20歳）が嫁いだ相手は、若干12歳の少年・カルルク。遊牧民と定住民、８歳の年の差を越えて、ふたりは結ばれるのか……？　『エマ』で19世紀末の英国を活写した森薫の最新作はシルクロードの生活文化。馬の背に乗り弓を構え、悠久の大地に生きるキャラクターたちの物語！
description.ko:
독특한 감성으로 큰 인기를 끌며 많은 사랑을 받았던 만화 <엠마>의 작가 모리카오루의 신작. 19세기 중앙아시아의 실크로드를 배경으로 한 장대한 스케일의 내용과 섬세하고 화려한 그림 그리고 한층 성숙된 탄탄한 스토리로 무장하였다. 드넓은 중앙 아시아를 배경으로 이야기가 펼쳐진다.

이제 무대는 중앙아시아 실크로드. 끝없는 대지에서 살아가는 유목 정착민의 낮과 밤이 펼쳐지는 카스피 해 인근의 지방도시. 아름다운 연상의 신부 아미루와 소년에서 어른이 되어가는 어린 신랑 카르르크는 부부가 된다. 다른 부족에서 시집온 아미루와 어린 신랑 카르르크의 평화롭고 행복한 시간도 잠시. 이 두 부부에게 다가오는 어두운 계획이 꿈틀거리기 시작한다.
description.ne:
मध्य एशिया, 19 औं शताब्दीको मध्य: 
क्यास्पियन सागर नजिकैको एक ग्रामीण सहरमा, आमिरा नामकी युवती आफू भन्दा आठ वर्ष कान्छो केटा कार्लुकसँग विवाह गर्न पहाड पारी टाढाको गाउँबाट आइपुग्छिन्।  
कथा दैनिक परिवार र सामुदायिक जीवनको विवरणहरूको बारेमा हो।
तर, आमिराको परिवारले उनलाई आफ्नो गाउँ फर्काउन माग गर्दा शान्तिपूर्ण वातावरण खलबलिएको छ।
description.pl: Dwudziestoletnia Amir zostaje wydana za młodszego o 8 lat Karluka. Dziewczyna opuszcza swoje koczownicze plemię, by zamieszkać wraz z mężem i jego rodziną w odległym mieście na Jedwabnym Szlaku. Uzdolniona w łucznictwie i jeździectwie, otwarta i bezpośrednia Amir próbuje odnaleźć swoje miejsce w nowej społeczności. Gdy między nią a Karlukiem rozkwita głębsze uczucie, w mieście pojawia się starszy brat Amir, żądając unieważnienia małżeństwa. Między dwoma rodzinami wybucha spór.
description.ru: Это истории из жизни Амиры - прекрасной лучницы и наездницы, посланной за горы, чтобы выйти замуж за Карлука - одного из поселенцев, который младше её на 8 лет. Благодаря многим своим умениям, Амира быстро находит себе место среди жителей деревни. Но всё меняется, когда люди из деревни Амиры решают забрать её назад.
description.th: ตั้งอยู่ในเมืองชนบทใกล้ทะเลแคสเปียนในเอเชียกลางในช่วงปลายศตวรรษที่ 19 ที่รัสเซียพิชิตเรื่องราวหมุนรอบหญิงสาวคนหนึ่งชื่ออาเมียร์ที่มาจากหมู่บ้านห่างไกลข้ามภูเขาเพื่อแต่งงานกับคาร์ลุก ชายหนุ่มอายุแปดขวบ จูเนียร์ของเธอ ชุดนี้ความสัมพันธ์ของพวกเขาในขณะที่มันพัฒนาในขณะที่การนำตุ๊กตุ่นอื่น ๆ เกี่ยวกับหญิงสาวที่ต่างๆและชีวิตประจำวันของพวกเขากับคู่หมั้นของตนและสามีไปตามเส้นทางสายไหม
description.uk: Події цієї романтично-пригодницької історії розгортаються у Середній Азії позаминулого століття. Молода дівчина Аміра із суворого кочового клану прибуває до селища, щоб вийти заміж за Карлука. Це незвичайний шлюб – адже наречений молодший за неї на вісім років. Однак найбільше бажання Аміри – стати йому гарною дружиною. Вона усіма силами старається догодити і йому, і своїй новій родині, дивуючи давно осілих землеробів своїми талантами.
description.vi:
Vào thế kỉ 19, ở khu vực Trung Á, tại một vùng thị tứ gần biển Caspi…

Có một cô dâu đã vượt qua bao núi đồi để đến bên một “chú rể nhỏ”.
Cô hoang dã, đáng yêu, chân thành, đáng quý.
Vút qua thảo nguyên xanh ngời, cô bên “chàng” cưỡi ngựa du ca.
Giương cung hướng lên trời, cô đem về biết bao ngạc nhiên, kì lạ.

Đây là câu chuyện về một phương trời xa xôi huyền bí.
Câu chuyện trên Con đường Tơ lụa lắm diệu kì.
Nơi cuộc sống diễn ra trong bao la, hào sảng.
Trong những hành trình, trong tình người và trong những lời ca.

Cùng với đó, không thể không nhắc đến nét vẽ tài hoa, tỉ mỉ đến tuyệt vời của tác giả, sẽ khắc họa những nét văn hóa quyến rũ đến lạ kì của một vùng Trung Á bát ngát, bao la.
description.zh-hk: 故事設定在19世紀後半，中亞與裏海週邊的草原地帶。以12岁的少年哈剌鲁和比他大8岁的新娘爱米尔为起頭，描写在丝绸之路的游牧民族和定居民族的生活。 由數個新娘的故事組成，新娘年齡不一，來自不同的地方。有各個角色的互動凸顯出當地的民俗風情。

title.en: A Terminally Ill Villainess Refuses to Be Adopted

description.en:
When the villain was young, she became Extra #1 who deceived him and sold him as a s*ave.
This girl, who was suffering from an incurable disease, tried to buy painkillers by selling him, but later dies miserably by the villain’s hand.

Fortunately, he had not been sold yet, so let’s kick the s*ave traders first.

Even as a 12-year-old orphan, I took great care of a 12-year-old villain.
Even though he was young, he was wary of me until the time of parting came, perhaps because he was the villain.
Fortunately, I was able to get a promise not to be killed.

And the day the villain family came to take him back finally came.

“……Are you telling me to go away?”
“If there is a place to return to, you have to go. Stay healthy and don’t die easily. Understand?”

After somehow sending away the villain who kept staring at me persistently, I turned around and vomited blood.

This annoying incurable disease.
Well, it’s okay because I know how to fix it.

I would be able to start a new life if I could heal my illness and leave here.
But.

“You……”

……There was something strange about the villain’s prickly face that was looking at me.

"You’re the first one… that can feel my presence…"
"What the… You look cute even though it's just a dream…"
Under the influence of his shaman father, Jinhyuk has the ability to sense non-human entities. Furthermore, the fairy who is in love with Jinhyuk hangs around him, pulls pranks on him, and, with the help of a succubus, enters his dreams. With his pure intentions, the fairy thought, "I will only meet him once." Instead, the brief meeting made his affections for him become stronger. Every night, Jinhyuk has a dream in which the fairy appears; unlike the ghosts he had seen as a child, the fairy appears to be harmless. What starts as pure curiosity turns into a flirtatious encounter, and the two are drawn into a sweet, creamy dream… 
A dream as fresh as milk and as sweet as cream!

altTitles.ja: 搾り取らないで、女商人さん

description.en:
Tartaros: A mysterious and massive underground dungeon. There, adventurers are engaged in a night and day struggle to find the treasure they seek. Lavi the New Adventurer is taking on the challenge of Tartaros, but has a problem. A renowned dark merchant, Philo the Beastkin, is pestering him to buy her strange items! She pushes items (often erotic) onto Lavi for him to use in every situation they come across. 

What will become of Lavi’s adventures?! Is he willing to buy anything from this adorably annoying merchant girl?!   

This is a fantasy comic with a teasing merchant!!
description.es:
el Misterioso laberinto subterráneo gigante "Tartaros".   
  
Allí, los aventureros de día y de noche se aventuran en  
buscan tesoros y otras riquezas. El aventurero novato Lavi (shota) que desafió el calabozo "tartaros" y que para su mala suerte se mete en algunos problemas, Es en ese instante cuando conoció a la mitad bestia Philo (ponkotsu), con quien hace un trato para ser su cliente habitual.  
¿Qué pasará con la aventura de Lavi? ¡seguirá Comprándole ítem   
a esta belleza y hermosa!  
  
¡¡¡la comedia de fantasía sobre el aventurero novato Lavi (shota)   
y la comerciante mitad bestia Philo (ponkotsu)!!

altTitles.ja: タルタロス劇場ワイルド

description.en: Collection of 4Koma centered around Persona 3, 4, 5 and their various spinoff games.

Losing a loved one is so painful that one may sometimes wish to be able to resurrect them—a weakness that the enigmatic Millennium Earl exploits. To make his mechanical weapons known as "Akuma," he uses the souls of the dead that are called back. Once a soul is placed in an Akuma, it is trapped forever, and the only way to save them is to exorcise them from their vessel using the Anti-Akuma weapon, "Innocence."  
  
After spending three years as the disciple of General Cross, Allen Walker is sent to the Black Order—an organization comprised of those willing to fight Akuma and the Millennium Earl—to become an official Exorcist. With an arm as his Innocence and a cursed eye that can see the suffering souls within an Akuma, it's up to Allen and his fellow Exorcists to stop the Millennium Earl's ultimate plot: one that can lead to the destruction of the world.
description.ru: Действие манги разворачивается в альтернативной Европе конца 19 века. Мир заселен Акума - созданиями Тысячелетнего Графа, созданными из механизма и человеческой души. Те, кто могут уничтожать Акума и освобождать души заключенные в них, называются экзорцистами, которые наделены некой Чистой Силой. Главный герой манги - Аллен Уолкер, юноша пятнадцати лет, проклятый Акума, носитель Чистой Силы в его левой руке. Путь Аллена Уолкера связан с его любовью к людям и Акума, путь, который принесет ему много неожиданностей…

title.en: I'll Raise You Well in This Life, Your Majesty!

altTitles.ko: 이번 생은 제대로 키워 드리겠습니다, 폐하!

altTitles.ko-ro: Ibeon Saeng'eun Jedaero Kiwo Deurigessseubnida, Pyeha!

altTitles.en: In This Life, I Will Raise You Well, Your Majesty!
I'll Atone by Raising You Properly in This Life, Your Majesty!

altTitles.es: En esta vida lo criare gentilmente su majestad

altTitles.vi: Kiếp này, ta sẽ nuôi dạy Bệ Hạ thật tốt!

altTitles.uk: Цього разу я виховуватиму вас як слід, Принце!

altTitles.ja: 皇妃さまの育児論～2度目は失敗いたしません!～

altTitles.zh: 陛下，这一生我会好好培养你！

description.de: Als Ellisa ihre Augen öffnet und in das Gesicht ihres jungen Sohnes Leon sieht, das voller Liebe und Sorge auf sie herabblickt, wird ihr klar, dass sie durch irgendein Wunder eine zweite Chance erhalten hat. In ihrem vergangenen Leben dachte sie, sie könne Leons Sicherheit nur gewährleisten, indem sie ihn zum Kaiser macht. Wenn sie aber gewusst hätte, dass Leon die Krone überhaupt nicht will und er sich das Leben nehmen würde, wenn ihm die Krone, getränkt mit dem Blut seiner Freunde und Feinde, präsentiert wird, dann hätte Ellisa einen anderen Weg gefunden, ihren Sohn zu beschützen. In diesem Leben ist sie fest entschlossen, eine Möglichkeit zu finden, um sowohl Leons Überleben als auch sein Glück zu bewahren... denn dieses Mal wird alles anders.
description.en:
When Ellisa opens her eyes and sees her young son, Leon, staring at her with eyes full of love and concern, she realizes that, by some miracle, she’s been given a second chance. In her past life, she thought making Leon emperor was the only way to ensure his safety. But if she had known Leon had never wanted the crown, or that laying a crown soaked with the blood of his enemies and beloved ones at his feet would mean he would take his own life before her eyes, she would’ve found another way. In this life, Ellisa is determined to find a way that will ensure both Leon’s survival and happiness. This time, things will be different.

---

**Note:** This work was first published in the order Japanese, English, and the Korean version after. Autors of this work is Korean-Japanese duo, but this work is based on a Korean Web Novel.

**Links:**
* [Official Chinese (Simp) Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc31390)
* [Official French Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/raise-you-well-in-this-life-fr)
* [Official German Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/raise-you-well-in-this-life-de)
* [Official Japanese Translation](https://sp.comics.mecha.cc/books/147862)
description.fr: Lorsqu’Ellisa se réveille et aperçoit son jeune fils, Leon, l’observer avec des yeux remplis d’amour et de tendresse, elle comprend qu’on lui a miraculeusement accordé une seconde chance. Dans sa vie passée, elle croyait que pousser son fils à devenir empereur était le seul moyen de garantir sa sécurité. Mais si elle avait su que Leon n’avait jamais voulu monter sur le trône ou que déposer à ses pieds une couronne imbibée du sang de ses ennemis et de ses proches signifierait qu’il s’ôterait la vie sous ses yeux, elle aurait trouvé une autre solution. Dans cette vie, Ellisa est déterminée à trouver un moyen qui assurera la survie et le bonheur de Leon. Cette fois, ce sera différent!
description.ja: 自分の欲によって息子のレオンと罪なき皇太子アセンシオを死なせた第2皇妃エリサ。2度めの生では子どもたちが望むままに生きていける世界にすると誓った。子どもたちを守るため、エリサはまず皇太子の信頼を得て彼の後見人になる。騎士団を創設し、水の精霊と契約するなど、他にも積極的に動くエリサに、皇帝カイトまでもが彼女に注目し始めるが…。
description.ko:
"왜 이렇게 돼 버린 걸까? 내가 할 수 있는 모든 걸 다 했는데."

아들 레온을 황제로 만들기 위해 자신의 모든 걸 바친 엘리사.
은염의 마녀라 불리며 잔혹한 짓을 스스럼없이 저질렀다.

그런 피로 가득한 날들이 지나 염원하던 레온이 황제가 되던 날,
레온은 자살을 택한다.
태어나 단 한 번도 행복한 적 없었다며 죽어가는 레온을 보며 절망하던 엘리사.
갑작스러운 폭발 후 눈을 떠보니 과거로 회귀했다.

내 앞에 있는 6살의 레온... 차갑게 식어 가던 체온과 비교하면, 이 온기는 얼마나 사랑스러운가?

"이게 꿈이 아니라면, 나에게 기적처럼 새로운 기회가 주어진 거라면,
널 위한다는 이유로 많은 걸 빼앗겼던 네게 이번만큼은 원하는 걸 모두 이루어주고 싶다."
description.uk:
Вона віддала все, щоб зробити свого сина, третього принца Леона, імператором. У день, коли ця мрія здійснилася, її син отруїв сам себе.
«Я... ніколи в житті не був щасливим».
Для Еліші, яка тримала холодний труп свого сина, залишався лише відчай. «Леон…»
Однак, втративши свідомість, вона прокинулась і виявила, що її маленький син знову мило дивиться на неї!
«Якщо це не сон, якщо це нова можливість… Я зроблю все заради тебе».
Еліша, яка поклялася стати доброю матір’ю в цьому житті, замість того, щоб залишати за собою трупи, претендуючи на імператорський престол, робить інший вибір, об'єднуючись зі своїм пасинком, наслідним принцом.
description.vi:
Nhị Hoàng Hậu Elisa đã dành trọn kiếp trước để đưa con trai Leon lên ngai vàng.

Dùng mọi thủ đoạn tàn nhẫn, hy sinh những người cô yêu quý, quay lưng với đau khổ và oán hận của chính Leon, bởi cô tin ngôi vị Hoàng Đế là cách duy nhất để bảo vệ con trai mình.

Thế nhưng, thứ Leon cần không phải là Hoàng vị. Chỉ đến khi con trai tự sát trên ngai vàng, Elisa mới hiểu được điều ấy. 

Sống lại thêm một lần nữa, đối diện với đôi mắt trẻ thơ đầy lo lắng của Leon, Elisa quyết định sẽ thay đổi số mệnh của họ.

Lần này, nhất định đích đến sẽ là hạnh phúc.

title.en: Nou Aru Ogre ga Tsuno o Kakusu

altTitles.ja: 能あるオーガは角を隠す

altTitles.ja-ro: Nou Aru Ogre ga Tsuno wo Kakusu

altTitles.en: A Talented Ogre Hides Its Horns

description.en:
A hero who dies in a fight with the Demon King is cursed on the verge of death. The curse was to reincarnate the hero as Rama, the daughter of a half-ogre and a half-human. 

Sixteen years have passed since then. Rama, who was reincarnated in an ogre village, was tormented by discrimination and prejudice because of her origin, but she had grown beyond the confines of the ogre village, making use of her experience as a former hero. The village chief, who has taken notice of her, gives her an order. The order was to select Rama as the new “Demon King Candidate” from the Ogre village.

A genuine otherworldly fantasy about a former hero torn between “humans” and “ogres”. The story begins!
description.ja:
魔王と相討つ形で死んだ勇者の男は、死の淵で魔王にある”呪い”をかけられる。その”呪い”とは勇者をオーガと人間の混血。ハーフオーガの娘「ラーマ」として輪廻転生させるものだった。
―その後16年の月日が経った。オーガの村に転生したラーマは、その出自故の差別や偏見に苛まれながらも、元勇者としての経験を生かしてオーガの村に収まらないほど成長していた。そんな彼に目を付けた村長よりある命令が下される。その命令とは、ラーマを新たな「魔王候補」としてオーガの村から選抜する、というものであった……。
”人”と”オーガ”との間で揺れ動く元勇者を描く、本格異世界ファンタジー。開幕！

title.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 杀死男主然后成为女魔头

altTitles.ru: Убить главного героя, чтобы стать злодейкой

altTitles.zh-ro: Sha Si Nan Zhu Ranhou Chengwei Nv Mo Tou
Shā Sǐ Nán Zhǔ Ránhòu Chéngwéi Nǚ Mó Tóu

altTitles.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Demoness

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

title.en: Shin Megami Tensei Apocrypha: War of the Dove

altTitles.ja-ro: Shin Megami Tensei Gaiten - Hato no Senki

altTitles.ja: 真・女神転生外典 鳩の戦記

description.en: A standalone story set in the larger Megami Tensei universe. Our hero Hato is just an ordinary schoolboy, until one day he receives a ~~Command Spell~~ Stigma on his left hand, forges a contract with ~~Lancer~~ Cu Chulainn to become his master, and is unwittingly dragged into a city-wide Holy ~~Grail~~ War.

Why torment scumbags for just a moment when you can do so forever? Join Su LuXia as she transmigrates into countless worlds with her ‘Supporting Female Character’s Counterattack System’ to unleash vengeance upon the deplorable male and female leads using a variety of tactics! 

Su LuXia: "The only thing that brings me comfort is the tears of remorse from scumbag men and the agonizing groans of despicable women who can't get what they want." 

System: "Has My Esteemed Host learnt to reel back her vengeful spirit? Nope, I guess not."
description.fr:
Su Lüxia fait partie d'un "Système de rôle féminin".
Sa mission : en se téléportant dans les corps des femmes trompées et bafouées, elle renverse leur destinée.
"Seules les larmes d'un bâtard de tricheur et les gémissements de douleur d'une garce m'apportent le réconfort."
description.it:
Schiacciare un verme per un solo momento dà una soddisfazione momentanea, ma le vite passate a schiacciare i vermi forniscono vite di soddisfazione continua. Su Lüxia, la nostra protagonista femminile, trasmigra in altri mondi con il sistema di contrattacco della seconda protagonista femminile; usa schemi e trucchi elaborati per picchiare innumerevoli bastardi traditori e puttane.

Su Lüxia: "Solo le lacrime di rimorso di un bastardo traditore, e i gemiti di dolore di una puttana incapace di ottenere ciò che vuole, mi danno conforto."

Sistema: "Il mio ospite ha attinto alla sua umanità oggi? No."

title.en: Onee-chan no Tomodachi Dakara Te wa Dasenai!

altTitles.ja: お姉ちゃんの友達だから手は出せない！

altTitles.en: I can't touch you because I'm your sister's friend!

description.en: Jiro Ninomiya had a problem. That is, his sister's friends Megu Kurotani and Erika Tenpaku are teasing him about something. Jiro, an adolescent boy, wants to touch their bouncy breasts right away, but if it's just a prank, his life could be in jeopardy, so he puts on a sorry face and tries his best to endure it. However, in reality, both Megu and Erika love Jiro, and it was a deliberate attempt to get his attention. Megu and Erika's temptations become more extreme as Jiro doesn't make any moves... A tactical love affair between two older sister friends who want him to touch her and a high school boy who they think they should never touch. Comedy!!
description.ja: 二ノ宮次郎には悩みがあった。それは、姉の友達である黒谷めぐと天白エリカが何かとHにからかってくること。思春期男子の次郎からすると、今すぐにでもふたりのたわわな胸を触りたいが、もしただの悪戯だったら人生が詰みかねないため、すました顔をしつつ必死に耐え続けていた。だが、実はめぐもエリカも次郎の事が大好きで、なんとか気を引こうとするが故の策だった。いっこうに手を出してこない次郎に、めぐとエリカの誘惑は過激になっていき……手を出してほしい姉友ふたりと絶対に手を出してはいけないと思っている男子高校生との駆け引きラブコメディ!!

title.en: Keikenchi Chochiku de Nonbiri Shoushin Ryokou ~Yuusha to Koibito ni Tsuihou sareta Senshi no Mujikaku zama~

altTitles.ja: 経験値貯蓄でのんびり傷心旅行 ～勇者と恋人に追放された戦士の無自覚ざまぁ～

altTitles.en: A Warrior Exiled by the Hero and His Lover

description.en:
After losing his girlfriend to a brave hero, Toru is expelled from his S-Rank party. With a feeling of sadness and pain in his heart, he defeats a demon he meets outside the city, and his ability [to save experience] is broken! Toru becomes level 300 in the blink of an eye! With this power that far surpasses that of heroes, there is nothing that can stop him. Kaede, a slave he met on his journey, forms a group called the "Mangyu Brigade", and easily completes dungeons, acquires the legendary sacred weapons, and thanks to his skills, his friends level up easily! He rescued a countess who was attacked by bandits on the road, and befriended a legendary beast. Oru's journey continues at a leisurely pace, as he repeatedly encounters various people along the way, while his former party of heroes are deprived of opportunities to play an active role and fall into decline. This is the beginning of the life of a 300 level warrior!  


---

[Original Webnovel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9483ge/)

Two weeks have passed since the start of high school. Miyao Mugi encounters the handsome, cool Kurose Kei coldly rejecting a confession. That very same day, Mugi meets him again, but in the most unexpected place and even acting completely differently?! What will happen now that she knows Kei's secret?
description.vi:
“Tôi cũng muốn có bạn trai!”

Mugi, một cô nữ sinh trung học với chỉ số kinh nghiệm yêu đương là số không và không có năng lực giao tiếp với đám con trai, tình cờ va vấp phải Kurose một hot boy trung học, tuy vô cùng đẹp trai nhưng lại cực kỳ không thân thiện với các cô gái.

Thật là thô lỗ và khó chịu mà, nhưng… hình như mình vừa vô tình biết được công việc bán thời gian bí mật của Kurose !? (っ ಠ‿ಠ) っ

title.en: Minasama ni wa Jinken ga Gozaimasen

altTitles.ja: 皆様には人権がございません

altTitles.vi: Các ngươi không có quyền con người

description.en: XX years have passed since the enforcement of "The Human Rights Proper Use Act." In the city, "humans with rights" live prosperously, while "humans designated as livestock without rights" are displayed in shop windows. The humans used as pets, experimental animals, and meat are pitiful creatures living in a world separate from mine... or so it was supposed to be.

title.en: Watashi Yori Tsuyoi Otoko to Kekkon Shitai no

altTitles.ja: 私より強い男と結婚したいの

altTitles.en: I Want to Marry a Man Stronger Than Me!

description.en: Akira Kogure, an introverted loner high-school student befriends the student council president Shizuka Takasaki, who excels in both academics and athletics, blessed with beautiful looks from birth. Though their relationship may seem to be normal, both are keeping a secret that they can't reveal to anyone?!

title.en: Kuro no Senki II: Isekai Teni Shita Boku ga Saikyou na no wa Bed no Ue dake no You desu

altTitles.en: Kuro no Senki II: It seems that I, who has moved to another world, is the strongest only on the bed

altTitles.ja: クロの戦記Ⅱ 異世界転移した僕が最強なのはベッドの上だけのようです

description.en: Kurono Crawford (Chrono Crawford), a noble of Cepheus Empire had a secret. It was that he came from a Different world… Modern Japan. Having the knowledge about the modern weapons and his sense of values, he was an existence almost like a cheat, aiming to be the “Harem king”.    Abandoned by his superiors, left in command of the Empire’s rejects consisting of demi-humans such as Minotaurs, Dwarfs, and Elves, and thrust into a position as head of a poor fiefdom, Chrono will do everything he can to rebuild and strengthen his forces and revitalize the land, aided in part by his knowledge of the other world.
description.pt-br: Kurold Crawford um nobre do Império Kefaus, tinha um segredo. ele veio de um mundo diferente… O Japão moderno. Tendo o conhecimento sobre as armas modernas e seu senso de valores, sua existência é quase como uma trapaça, com o objetivo de ser o "rei do Harém".    Abandonado por seus superiores, deixado no comando dos rejeitados do Império, consistindo de demi-humanos como Minotauros, Anões e Elfos, e levado à posição de chefe de um feudo pobre, Kuro fará tudo o que puder para reconstruir e fortalecer suas forças e revitalizar a terra, auxiliado em parte por seus conhecimentos do outro mundo….

title.en: Satsuriku no Kuindeddo – 7-nin no Onna Shikeishuu

altTitles.ja-ro: Satsuriku no Queen Dead – Nananin no Onna Shikeishuu

altTitles.ja: 殺戮のクインデッド -7人の女死刑囚-

description.en: Deep Palace is a prison island that houses only death row inmates. A young girl, Akari, was kept in the "Deep Palace" for a certain purpose... One day, the death row inmates suddenly start killing each other! A battle royale called the “Killing” is taking place where prisoners can do whatever they want as they remain the last ones standing! In the face of this pandemonium, will Akari be able to safely survive the "Killing" and escape from the prison?!
description.es-la: Cinco estudiantes, 3 mujeres y 2 hombres, llegan a una isla remota, supervivientes del naufragio de un barco. Al encontrarse en esta situación extrema, su instinto y su conciencia se cruzan y chocan. Pensamientos cruzados, sentimientos de amor y odio mezclados con confianza y traición.
